m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Ube Launches Crowdfunding Campaign To Support Smart Dimmer February 21st, 2013 by Adam Johnston   Disruptive technologies and the emerging crowdfunding platform are becoming more commonplace as not only a marketing and finance tool, but also changing the dynamics of how energy is distributed. Enter Austin, Texas-based company Ube, which launched its  Kickstarter crowdfunding  campaign for itsr award-winning “smart” dimmer.
